sourceMeaningMnemonic: Whenever a <radical>turkey</radical> comes in the <radical>door</radical>, you <kanji>employ</kanji> them.
meaningInfo: Imagine hundreds of turkeys walking in. The word has gotten out amongst the turkey community that if they walk through your door, you'll employ them.
readingMnemonic: Although you <kanji>employ</kanji> turkeys, when a <ja><reading>子</reading></ja> (<ja>こ</ja>) walks through your door, you send them away.
readingInfo: "I will employ turkeys, but I will never employ children!" you exclaim.
